title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, December 3, 2020
description: It was on this day in 1947 that "A Streetcar Named Desire" opened on Broadway. When the curtain went down, the audience applauded for 30 minutes.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1947 that "A Streetcar Named Desire" opened on Broadway. When the curtain went down, the audience applauded for 30 minutes.
